synopsis.text: Detectiveâ€™s Office. Together, they delve into the unknown, tackling peculiar cases such as the ghostly apparitions in the Asakusa Juunikai building and the chilling tales of the man-eating entity that roams the wintery streets. As they navigate through the bustling city of Tokyo during the height of Westernization, they cross paths with other esteemed literary figures like Nomura Kodo, Yoshii Isamu, Hagiwara Sakutaro, and Wakayama Bokusui, who find themselves entangled in Takuboku's thrilling adventures. Prepare for a captivating journey through history, blending mystery, poetry, and camaraderie in this enthralling anime adaptation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
